title: New: MMOTHS – Santo
content:
It’s been a while since we’ve heard anything from Irish wunder-kid MMOTHS, but he has returned in his ever spectacular fashion with the ethereal and hauntingly beautiful Santo.

It twists and turns in synthetic glory and builds into and explosive and spine tingling outro, drenched in a hot flux of burning electronics and vocals awash with reverb. An album is expected early next year and judging by this track, it’s going to worth the wait.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d46
